I like to go swimming in the summer

Swimming is my most favourite activity. Firstly, swimming is a sport for all age groups; besides, it is a lifetime activity. People can learn to swim as young as 4 or 5 years old or as old as 60 or 70. All it takes is the right instruction and desire to get in the pool. Secondly, swimming is cheap. You don’t have to spend much money on it.

There are three reasons I like to Swim

  • I get lot of exercise
  • I enojoy the Freedom
  • I have an oppourtunity to be in the sun
